titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1327 from Lestock Robert Reid, Acting Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to the Officiating Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication from the Resident — No. 16 dated 29 April 1838 — respecting the suppression of the slave trade. To affect this goal, it authorises him to make arrangements with the Imam of Muscat and the Arab chiefs not subject to Ottoman, or Persian control.
